option.value: {"/home/trendt000104/Projects/spring-boot-ionic-backend":"{\"/src/main/java/com/nelioalves/cursomc/cursomc/domain/Pedido.java\":\"This file defines the `Pedido` (Order) class, which represents an order in an e-commerce application.\\n\\n`Pedido`: A class that represents an order, containing information such as the order ID, order date, payment, customer, delivery address, and the items in the order.\\n\\n`getId()`: Returns the order ID.\\n`setId(Integer id)`: Sets the order ID.\\n`getInstance()`: Returns the order date.\\n`setInstance(Date instance)`: Sets the order date.\\n`getPagamento()`: Returns the payment associated with the order.\\n`setPagamento(Pagamento pagamento)`: Sets the payment associated with the order.\\n`getCliente()`: Returns the customer associated with the order.\\n`setCliente(Cliente cliente)`: Sets the customer associated with the order.\\n`getEnderecoDeEntrega()`: Returns the delivery address associated with the order.\\n`setEnderecoDeEntrega(Endereco enderecoDeEntrega)`: Sets the delivery address associated with the order.\\n`getItens()`: Returns the set of items in the order.\\n`setItens(Set\\u003cItemPedido\\u003e itens)`: Sets the set of items in the order.\\n`getTotal()`: Calculates and returns the total amount of the order.\\n`equals(Object o)`: Compares two `Pedido` objects for equality based on their ID.\\n`hashCode()`: Returns the hash code of the `Pedido` object based on its ID.\",\"/src/main/java/com/nelioalves/cursomc/cursomc/dto/ProdutoDTO.java\":\"This file contains a single class, `ProdutoDTO`, which is a data transfer object (DTO) for a product entity.
